title: Veggie Pizza - Miraflores
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Delivery, Take-out
description: A larger outlet of this pizza restaurant, this one is located at ovalo Guttierez. Serves pizzas and also other courses like veggie burger, desserts, starters. Ask if uses honey in the pizza base. Selection of wines (some organic) and craft beer. Delivery for Miraflores & San Isidro.
